citations.narrative:
The facility has not administered ectoparasite prevention in accordance with the written Program of Veterinary Care.
Whereas the program prescribes monthly prevention between the months of April and November for adult dogs, the
facility has not administered prevention since July 2024. Even though the facility had not had evidence of parasites prior
to or since the last administration, parasites may still affect dogs during these months. The facility must adhere to a
management schedule approved by the attending veterinarian.
Correct by December 2, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The facility has not administered ectoparasite prevention in accordance with the written Program of Veterinary Care. 
Whereas the program prescribes monthly prevention between the months of April and November for adult dogs, the 
facility has not administered prevention since July 2024. Even though the facility had not had evidence of parasites prior 
to or since the last administration, parasites may still affect dogs during these months. The facility must adhere to a 
management schedule approved by the attending veterinarian.  
 
Correct by December 2, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
